 ==function==
 * function name should start with *uppercase* letter.
 * function parameter must start with suffix *p* to identify them as a parameter variable.
   e.g 
      {{{ void ExampleFunction( int pIntVar, float pFloatVar ); }}}

 ==class==
 * class name should start with *c*
 * member variable should start with *m_* and next letter must be capital.
   e.g
    {{{
     class cExampleClass
      {
         public:
                int m_IntVar;
                void  ExampleFunction( int pIntVar, float pFloatVar );
     };
    }}}
 
 ==variable==
 * variable name should be start with lower case letter.
 * e.g.
   {{{ int varInt; }}}
